{{Wireless embedded system |brand=XAVi |model=X7968 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/30/2007 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=RYUX7967 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model=CX94610 |cpu1_cspeed=264 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Conexant |wi1_chip1_model=CX94610 |wi1_chip2_brand=Conexant |wi1_chip2_model=CX50221 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=PRISM_XX_XX_XX |default_ssid_regex=^PRISM_[a-f0-9]{2}_[a-f0-9]{2}_[a-f0-9]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:01:38 |oui_eth=00:01:38 |default_ch= }} Solos 4610 based
FCC ID appears to apply to the.. *X7922 *X7927 *X7967 *X7968
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/xavi/xavi_7968 On the OpenWrt wiki]
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :The sample SSID shown in the FCC manual is '''PRISM_1e_52_52''', but there are 132 entries for the '''PRISM_XX_XX_XX''' pattern with an 00:01:38 OUI. Presumed 00:01:38 ('''XAVi''') OUI..
